attributes.action: Bring before the courts anybody in the BBC who was involved in the misappropriation of licence fee taxes.
attributes.additional_details: Which were used by the BBC to falsely pay off staff in a redundancy scheme while at the same time planning to rehire them WITHOUT requiring them to repay their severance payment.  That is CONSPIRACY to defraud and is illegal.

rejection.details: This isn't appropriate for an e-petition because since there are already laws that cover conspiracy to defraud, if the laws have been broken,  those responsible will be brought before the courts.  Maybe this is something to contact your MP about and take forward?
